### a)
*Use the `lm()` function to perform a simple linear regression with `mpg` as the response and `horsepower` as the predictor. Print the results and comment on the output.*

```{r auto_linear}
auto <- as_tibble(Auto)
auto %>% lm(mpg ~ horsepower, .) %>% tidy()
```
